languages.text: Keykeross performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −2 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Кикеросс совершает атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, которая наносит на 50% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} теряет 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Keykeross performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} that deals −50% damage. If the target fails a Toughness resistance test, its {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} are reduced by −2 for 1 round.

キーケロスは−50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に失格した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が−2減少される。

キーケロスは−50%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行う。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に失格した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が−2減少される。

languages.text: 绮克萝丝进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}会降低2点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 绮克萝丝进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}，此次攻击造成的伤害降低50%。目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，如果未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数与{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}会降低2点，持续一轮。

绮克萝丝进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，此次攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低50%。目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，如果未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}会降低2点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Keykeross lanza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que inflige −50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. languages.text: Keykeross führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} aus, der −50 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht. Besteht das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} nicht, werden seine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang um −2 reduziert.

languages.text: Keykeross, −%50 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Hedef, bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçemezse {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'si{/g} 2'şer puan azalır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
